title: Settle down country (A)
creator_credit: Western Deserts Oustations Council, CAAC, CAAMA, NAIHO, David Batty, Jim Buckell and Pam Nathan
brief_description: Documents the return of the Pintubi people to their own lands after many years on Government run settlements. Extensive use of archival footage offers an added historical perspective to this account of the efforts of these people to retain their cultural heritage. Based on the book of the same name by Dick Leichleitner Japanangka and Pam Nathan.
